content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

DROP TABLE [wwi].[FactOrder]

CREATE TABLE [wwi].[FactOrder]
( 
	[OrderKey] [bigint]  NOT NULL,
	[CityKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[StockItemKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[OrderDateKey] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[PickedDateKey] [date]  NULL,
	[SalespersonKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[PickerKey] [int]  NULL,
	[WWIOrderID] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[WWIBackorderID] [int]  NULL,
	[Description] [nvarchar](100)  NOT NULL,
	[Package] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[Quantity] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[UnitPrice] [decimal](18,2)  NOT NULL,
	[TaxRate] [decimal](18,3)  NOT NULL,
	[TotalExcludingTax] [decimal](18,2)  NOT NULL,
	[TaxAmount] [decimal](18,2)  NOT NULL,
	[TotalIncludingTax] [decimal](18,2)  NOT NULL,
	[LineageKey] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [CustomerKey] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO wwi.FactOrder
(OrderKey 1, CityKey 2, CustomerKey 3, StockItemKey 4, OrderDateKey 5, PickedDateKey 6, SalespersonKey 7, PickerKey 8, WWIOrderID 9, WWIBackorderID 10, Description 11, Package 12, Quantity 13, UnitPrice 14, TaxRate 15, TotalExcludingTax 16, TaxAmount 17, TotalIncludingTax 18, LineageKey 19)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-factorder.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 3
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.FactOrder
GO
